title: The Federal Reserve's Review of Its Monetary Policy Strategy, Tools, and Communication Practices
content: For release on delivery  1:05 p.m. EDT  May 20, 2019      The Federal Reserve’s Review of Its Monetary Policy Strategy, Tools, and  Communication Practices    Remarks by     Richard H. Clarida     Vice Chair     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “Fed Listens:  A Capstone Roundtable”  hosted by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York     New York, New York    May 20, 2019
